CustomField.description:
Records manager notes related to worst case submissions. Churn/Contraction forecasts only.
Primarily used in Sales Manager Shotcaller Retool App.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Records manager notes related to worst case submissions. Churn/Contraction forecasts only.
Primarily used in Sales Manager Shotcaller Retool App.
CustomField.label: Manager Notes: Worst Case
